last_episode_to_air.name: Overview
last_episode_to_air.overview: While BBA and the others converge on the clinic, Nina persuades Hap to show her his research, and Karim unlocks one of the house's final secrets.

name: The OA
overview: Prairie Johnson, blind as a child, comes home to the community she grew up in with her sight restored. Some hail her a miracle, others a dangerous mystery, but Prairie wonâ€™t talk with the FBI or her parents about the seven years she went missing.

seasons.name: Part I
seasons.overview: Seven years after vanishing from her home, a young woman returns with mysterious new abilities and recruits five strangers for a secret mission.

seasons.name: Part II
seasons.overview: After waking up to a new life in San Francisco, OA is drawn into a search for a missing teen and begins to encounter familiar faces from her past.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: A woman missing for seven years turns up at a hospital with strange scars on her back but can't -- or won't -- reveal where she's been.

episodes.name: New Colossus
episodes.overview: The OA retraces the dramatic twists and turns in her life after a childhood accident, leading up to a fateful encounter far from home many years later.

episodes.name: Champion
episodes.overview: A journalist approaches the family with an offer. At Hap's, a bond is forged with Homer and the others as they hatch a desperate plan.

episodes.name: Away
episodes.overview: An agonizing dilemma gives OA a new perspective on the group's plight. Homer resolves to find out what Hap's experiments are really about.

episodes.name: Paradise
episodes.overview: While Hap zeroes in on a new test subject in Cuba, Homer and OA work to perfect their escape plan. Scott reaches his breaking point.

episodes.name: Forking Paths
episodes.overview: As the group continues its search for the final movement, a startling turn of events gives Hap's work a new urgency.

episodes.name: Empire of Light
episodes.overview: An ominous new dream and a tense outing with Nancy and Abel take a toll on OA. Steve finds his life in turmoil once again.

episodes.name: Invisible Self
episodes.overview: After OA recounts a dramatic final night at Hap's, the others begin to see her story in a new light. The fragments of the dream click into place.

1.name: Part I
1.overview: Seven years after vanishing from her home, a young woman returns with mysterious new abilities and recruits five strangers for a secret mission.

episodes.name: Angel of Death
episodes.overview: While private eye Karim Washington scours San Francisco for a missing teen who was involved in a cryptic game, OA wakes up in unfamiliar surroundings.

episodes.name: Treasure Island
episodes.overview: At the clinic, OA discovers what happened to her friends back at Hap's. Karim turns his attention to a doctor who worked for Pierre Ruskin.

episodes.name: Magic Mirror
episodes.overview: In Michigan, Steve begs the gang to try jumping to another dimension, and a presence in Buck's mirror inspires an unlikely pilgrimage.

episodes.name: SYZYGY
episodes.overview: Karim visits Nina at the clinic for help finding the secret entrance to the house. Meanwhile, Hap meets a fellow traveler, and Homer goes on a date.

episodes.name: The Medium & The Engineer
episodes.overview: After a harrowing ordeal, OA and Karim find themselves locked inside a labyrinth of puzzles. Nagging doubts prompt Homer to snoop on Dr. Percy.

episodes.name: Mirror Mirror
episodes.overview: As BBA and the kids head west, an alarming news report forces them to speed up their plans. Jesse wrestles with lingering trauma from the shooting.

episodes.name: Nina Azarova
episodes.overview: Karim returns to the house with reinforcements, OA tries to access Nina's memories, and Hap offers to discharge Scott -- after one last experiment.

episodes.name: Overview
episodes.overview: While BBA and the others converge on the clinic, Nina persuades Hap to show her his research, and Karim unlocks one of the house's final secrets.

2.name: Part II
2.overview: After waking up to a new life in San Francisco, OA is drawn into a search for a missing teen and begins to encounter familiar faces from her past.
